intro.description: In a few steps, this cheat sheet will guide you through the import of a TestSpecification.

item.title: Open menu
item.description: First, go with the mouse courser in the GlobalTester Navigator window. Right-click, and choose "Import".

item.title: Select TestSpecification
item.description: In the tree view, select "GlobalTester > Import TestSpecification from Plugin". Click the "Next" button.

item.title: WizardPage Title
item.description: In the text field "Projectname", choose a name for your project. You can import the same TestSpecification under different names in your workspace. In the list, you can choose the TestSpecification you want to import. A description of it is given in the field below. Then click "Finish".
